title: About chroma ip sale
body: Which chromas will be available for ip?

replies.body: I don't have any details on sales until it's been announced.  Your best bet would be to bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) guide to stay up to date.  Hang tight until then!

Update, an announcement has been [posted here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/chroma-ip-sales-32217-4517)  :D  ! The first chroma IP sale of the year is coming from 3/22/2017 11:00 PT until 4/5/2017 23:59 PT.   I hope that helps!
So no prestigious lb chroma sale? D:
